BackWtUnderhandChinup.name: Weighted Chin-up
BackWtUnderhandChinup.preparation: Step up and grasp bar with underhand shoulder width grip.
BackWtUnderhandChinup.execution: Pull body up until elbows are to sides. Lower body until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.
BackWtUnderhandChinup.comments: Added weight can be placed on dip belt or dumbbell can be placed between ankles.
BackWtUnderhandChinup.synergists: levatorscapulae, brachioradialis, pectoralissternal, brachialis, deltoidposterior, trapeziusmiddle, teresmajor, trapeziuslower, pectoralisminor, rhomboids

BackWtCloseGripChinup.name: Weighted Parallel Close Grip Pull-up
BackWtCloseGripChinup.preparation: Step up and grasp close grip parallel bars.
BackWtCloseGripChinup.execution: Pull body up until elbow are to sides. Lower body until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.
BackWtCloseGripChinup.comments: Added weight can be placed on dip belt or dumbbell can be placed between ankles.
BackWtCloseGripChinup.synergists: levatorscapulae, brachioradialis, pectoralissternal, brachialis, deltoidposterior, trapeziusmiddle, teresmajor, trapeziuslower, pectoralisminor, rhomboids

BackWtPullup.name: Weighted Pull-up
BackWtPullup.preparation: Step up and grasp bar with overhand wide grip.
BackWtPullup.execution: Pull body up until chin is above bar. Lower body until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.
BackWtPullup.comments: Added weight can be placed on dip belt or dumbbell can be placed between ankles as shown. Range of motion will be compromised if grip is too wide.
BackWtPullup.synergists: infraspinatus, rhomboids, levatorscapulae, brachioradialis, bicepsbrachii, deltoidposterior, brachialis, trapeziusmiddle, teresmajor, trapeziuslower, pectoralisminor, teresminor

BackWtPullupN.name: Weighted Pull-up (neutral grip)
BackWtPullupN.preparation: Step up and grasp bar with neutral grip.
BackWtPullupN.execution: Pull body up until neck reaches height of hands. Lower body until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.
BackWtPullupN.comments: Added weight can be placed on dip belt or dumbbell can be placed between ankles. Special angled pullup bar assembly is shown. Also see Wide Grip Pullup and Underhand Chinup.
BackWtPullupN.synergists: levatorscapulae, brachioradialis, pectoralissternal, bicepsbrachii, brachialis, teresmajor, trapeziuslower, pectoralisminor, rhomboids

BackWtPullupOpen.name: Weighted Pull-up (open-centered bar)
BackWtPullupOpen.preparation: Reach up and grasp bar with wide overhand grip.
BackWtPullupOpen.execution: Pull body up until neck reaches height of hands. Lower body until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.
BackWtPullupOpen.comments: Added weight can be placed on dip belt or dumbbell can be placed between ankles. Also see Pullup without added weight. Range of motion will be compromised if grip is too wide.
BackWtPullupOpen.synergists: levatorscapulae, brachioradialis, pectoralissternal, bicepsbrachii, brachialis, teresmajor, trapeziuslower, pectoralisminor, rhomboids

BackWtRearPullup.name: Weighted Rear Pull-up
BackWtRearPullup.preparation: Step up and grasp bar with overhand wide grip.
BackWtRearPullup.execution: Pull body up until bar touches back of neck. Lower body until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.
BackWtRearPullup.comments: Added weight can be placed on dip belt (as shown) or dumbbell can be placed between ankles. Range of motion will be compromised if grip is too wide.
BackWtRearPullup.synergists: levatorscapulae, brachioradialis, pectoralissternal, bicepsbrachii, brachialis, teresmajor, trapeziuslower, pectoralisminor, rhomboids
